title: (x) Monospaced serif - Century Schoolbook Monospace {Tamas}
content:
Hi, I'm looking for this monospaced sans serif, used by Value & Service in a catalogue.

Any ideas? Thanks!

Timo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225002926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1279_5192.jpg)
author: Timo Ilola

comments.content:
Hm, thanks! It's in the same direction, but the V&S one seems to be more didone modern. It's also more condensed than Nimbus, if you compare the o and m.

Nimbus:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225002926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nimbus_3497.gif)
Then I say [Century Schoolbook Monospace OT by Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20150225002926/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/century_schoolbook_monospace_ot/)

That seems to be an exact match.

Thanks a bunch!
